mapper.sql: a.exam_class AS "examClass", a.exam_sub_class AS "examSubClass", a.desc_item AS "descItem", a.desc_name AS "descName", a.description AS "description", a.description_code AS "descriptionCode", a.input_code AS "inputCode"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_rpt_pattern( exam_class, exam_sub_class, desc_item, desc_name, description, description_code, input_code ) VALUES ( #{examClass}, #{examSubClass}, #{descItem}, #{descName}, #{description}, #{descriptionCode}, #{inputCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_rpt_pattern SET exam_class = #{examClass}, exam_sub_class = #{examSubClass}, desc_item = #{descItem}, desc_name = #{descName}, description = #{description}, description_code = #{descriptionCode}, input_code = #{inputCode} WHERE id = #{id}
